Description: Solid-cast copper alloy figure of Thoth; the headdress is lost; arms held out at the front holding a wedjat-eye; rectangular base with two tangs.
Dimensions: Height: 10.50 centimetres ((to base of stand only))
Exhibition history: Exhibited: 1990-2003, Frankfurt, Naturmuseum Senckenberg, LT Loan 2013, May - September, Perth, Western Australian Museum, The Book of the Dead: Journey Through the Afterlife 2015, 19th June - 5th Sept. Wrexham County Borough Museum. Egyptian Written Culture. 2016 12 Mar-8 May, Carlisle, Tullie House, Writing for Eternity 2016 20 May-4 Sept, The Salisbury Museum, Writing for Eternity 2016 16 Sept-10 Jan 2017, Abergavenny Museum, Writing for Eternity 2017 21 Jan-21 May, Museum of Hartlepool, Writing for Eternity
